body:

# PR Summary

Converted the MSI's bitmaps (BMPs) to PNGs that have transparent backgrounds instead of white backgrounds.

This breaks rendering of images for Windows 7 and Server 2008R2, but it's required for accessibility purposes so that the High Contrast Black theme renders text correctly for accessibility. (Unfortunately, BMP does not support transparency.)

## PR Context

In order to be fully accessible, we need to support the High Contrast Black theme in Windows. This makes system-wide text white which is unreadable on the BMP's hardcoded white background.
